feed.work: I am a Front-end developer with strong mobile web strategist skills and front-end designer and am located in London, UK. I aim to create great experiences that looks and works beautifully across anything that can access the Web.
feed.speaking: I am extremely passionate about the Web, new technologies and trends and love talking about it. If you're interested in having me speak or do a workshop at your conference, company, event, etc contact me.
feed.social1: I love sharing information, learning loads of new cool stuff every day, and participating in the collective conversation
feed.social2: I write about mobile web development, responsive design and more on my blog
feed.social3: Code sharing and publishing service, or that it's a social networking site for programmers. Both statements are true, but neither explain exactly why GitHub is special
feed.contact: Looking to get in touch?. The quickest way to contact me is on Twitter at
feed.txtemail: Or email me (please no agencies) at
feed.name: Leo Lanese
feed.title: Key Technical Skills
feed.key: Freelance Front-end Web Developer specialising in Responsive Web Development, Mobile First, cutting edge technologies, Mobile UX and SmartPhones optimisation.
feed.generalskill: Vanilla OOP JavaScript/ECMAScript 5 and jQuery Library. CSS artist. HTML5/DTD architect. Responsive Design and Mobile First guru. BDD/TDD evangelist. Mobile UX. Optimisation First enthusiastic. Agile (Scrum/Kanban) evangelist. xUnit: Jasmine/js-test-driver with PhantomJS. CasperJS. GIT/SVN integration. JSHint. JSON/XML. UNIX/MAC. XSS. XHTML. XHTML-MP. Web-wireframe. IDE IntelliJ/Aptana. Jenkins (Hudson). Knockout MV*
feed.s1_title: Responsive Web Design, The Best Parts
feed.s2_title: Progressive Enhancement, Mobile first and Responsive Web Design in Action
feed.s3_title: Progressive Enhancement, Mobile first and Responsive Web Design

entry.title: Senior Front End Developer
entry.achievement: Established and developed the responsive design and progressive enhancement technologies
entry.skill: javaScript best practices, jQuery, DOM, HTML5, CSS3/2, AJAX, CSS2/3, LESS, Bunddle, reset.css, Responsive Design,960gs, Progressive/regressive enhancement, gracefully degradation, JSON/XML, webKit rendering engine, mobile WEB optimise cross-browsing and cross-devices low and high-end, SVN (subversion) Agile/Kanban, TDD, functional test, user test, unit tests, eXtremme Programming, pair programming, Android SDK and Apple SDK, Modernizr (yepnope, respond, polyfills, etc ) remote debugging
entry.role: Developing with the highest attention to detail and strive for clean, simple, elegant, reusable and testable code delivering great user experience on a brand new HTML5, Responsive Web and Mobile First Solution every sprint. Using RWD best practices with JS (debound, augmentation, patterns, caching, etc). LESS (lint, @media bubbling, mixins, @vars, etc) on a daily continuous integration using Jenkings and Github. Getting all the task running  with Grunt (customise jQuery, jasmine and LESS). Test-driven JS using Jasmine and Karma also testing layout using PhantomJS and CasperJS. Progressive Enhancement: Retina, broadband connection, SVG, js not-js, CSS3, etc. Improving the Mobile UX, Mobile Friendly functionality. Agile.
